com.topcoder.security.authenticationfactory
Class DefaultKeyConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.security.authenticationfactory.DefaultKeyConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
PrincipalKeyConverter
public class DefaultKeyConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrincipalKeyConverter

DefaultKeyConverter class implements the PrincipalKeyConverter interface, it is able to load the key mappings from the configuration file via the Configuration Manager component.

This class is thread-safe since it is immutable.

Version:
2.0
Author:
TCSDESIGNER, TCSDEVELOPER

Constructor Detail

DefaultKeyConverter

public DefaultKeyConverter(java.lang.String namespace)
                    throws ConfigurationException

Create a DefaultKeyConverter instance with the given namespace.

Parameters:
namespace - the namespace to load key mappings.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if the namespace is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the namespace is empty string.
ConfigurationException - if failed to mappings from the configuration manager.
Method Detail

convert

public java.lang.String convert(java.lang.String key)

Return the converted principal's key from the given authenticator's key. If no corresponding value found, will return key value.

Specified by:
convert in interface PrincipalKeyConverter
Parameters:
key - the authenticator's key.
Returns:
the converted principal's key.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if the key is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the key is emtpy string.
